project_abstract.cdata: The Urumqi Urban Transport Improvement Project aims to foster a multi-modal urban transport system which is planned, designed, and used for the safe, efficient, and healthy movement of people and goods. The project has five components. 1) Road Network Development will provide a 31.25 km "Ring Road" which will link the old central business district (CBD) to new development areas of the city, protect the CBD from extraneous traffic, and distribute regional traffic to the urban trunk road network. 2) Traffic Management and Road Safety will enhance the efficiency in the use of the existing road space and improve traffic safety. 3) Public Transport will develop public transport as a viable and sustainable travel alternative to the car by improving the level of existing bus services. It will support the ongoing reforms towards the strengthening of the regulatory and planning capabilities of the Urban Construction Commission and support commercial viability of Urumqi Public Transport Company. 4) Environmental Management will support Urumqi's leadership which is very active in promoting and implementing environmental protection and improvement initiatives, and further develop a Motor Vehicle Emission Control Strategy. 5) Institutional Development will strengthen local capacity and processes for urban transport, planning, programming and budgeting, and system management.

P045915.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>乌鲁木齐城市交通改善项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>该项目的内容包括：通过建设环路和其他支持环路运营的地方道路工程改善道路网络，改进道路养护管理系统，采购道路养护设备；通过投资和技术援助的方式实施交通管理和道路安全，内容包括路口渠化、交通标志和面控系统；行人过街设施；停车系统改善；加强对道路使用者的教育；事故分析和道路安全；发展公共交通使其成为代替轿车的可行和可持续的交通方式，主要是通过提高现有公交服务水平，支持正在进行的改革，加强公交部门的管理和规划能力；通过绿化和环路环境规划以及机动车尾气排放管理战略改善环境管理和保护；加强当地城市交通、规划、预算和系统管理的机构能力和发展。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
